args.natural_language_statement: Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{z â†’ âˆ} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every Îµ > 0 there exists M such that |f(z)-L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. Translate into Lean4 (no proof), ending with := by sorry.

retrieved_examples.nl: The limit lim_{xâ†’âˆ} g(x)=L iff for all Îµ>0 exists M: for x>M we have |g(x)-L|<Îµ.
retrieved_examples.lean: theorem tendsto_at_top_iff (g : â„ â†’ â„) (L : â„) : (Filter.Tendsto g Filter.atTop (ğ“ L)) â†” (âˆ€ Îµ : â„, Îµ > 0 â†’ âˆƒ M, âˆ€ x, x > M â†’ |g x - L| < Îµ) := by sorry

retrieved_examples.nl: Definition of limit at infinity in complex plane: uses filter.cocompact.
retrieved_examples.lean: def tends_to_infty_complex (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (L : â„‚) : Prop := Filter.Tendsto f filter.cocompact (ğ“ L)

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Set
open Filter

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{z â†’ âˆ} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every Îµ > 0 there exists M such that |f(z)-L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemannSphere_atTop_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (L : â„‚) :
    Tendsto f atTop (ğ“ L) â†” âˆ€ Îµ : â„, 0 < Îµ â†’ âˆƒ M : â„, âˆ€ z : â„‚, M < Complex.abs z â†’ Complex.abs (f z - L) < Îµ := by sorry

args.query: cocompact filter mathlib4 cocompact filter tendsto complex at_infty

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{z â†’ âˆ} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every Îµ > 0 there exists M such that |f(z)-L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemannSphere_atTop_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (L : â„‚) :
  Tendsto f (Filter.cocompact â„‚) (ğ“ L) â†”
  âˆ€ Îµ : â„, 0 < Îµ â†’ âˆƒ M : â„, âˆ€ z : â„‚, M < Norm.norm z â†’ Norm.norm (f z - L) < Îµ := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{z â†’ âˆ} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every Îµ > 0 there exists M such that |f(z)-L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. -/
theorem tendsto_riemannSphere_atTop_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (L : â„‚) :
  Filter.Tendsto f (Filter.cocompact â„‚) (ğ“ L) â†”
  âˆ€ Îµ : â„, Îµ > 0 â†’ âˆƒ M : â„, âˆ€ z : â„‚, M < â€–zâ€– â†’ â€–f z - Lâ€– < Îµ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{z â†’ âˆ} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every Îµ > 0 there exists M such that |f(z)-L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. -/

theorem tendsto_riemannSphere_atTop_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (L : â„‚) :
  Filter.Tendsto f (Filter.cocompact â„‚) (ğ“ L) â†”
  âˆ€ Îµ : â„, Îµ > 0 â†’ âˆƒ M : â„, âˆ€ z : â„‚, M < â€–zâ€– â†’ â€–f z - Lâ€– < Îµ := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Suppose L âˆˆ â„‚. Show that lim_{z â†’ âˆ} f(z) = L in the sense of the Riemann sphere iff for every Îµ > 0 there exists M such that |f(z)-L| < Îµ whenever |z| > M. -/

theorem tendsto_riemannSphere_atTop_iff (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) (L : â„‚) :
  Filter.Tendsto f (Filter.cocompact â„‚) (nhds L) â†”
  âˆ€ Îµ : â„, Îµ > 0 â†’ âˆƒ M : â„, âˆ€ z : â„‚, M < Norm.norm z â†’ Norm.norm (f z - L) < Îµ := by sorry
